data.text:
Adobe Systems, Inc. – Campus

Founded in 1982, Adobe Systems builds award-winning software solutions for Network Publishing including web, print, video, wireless, and broadband applications. Since 1995, Fortune has ranked Adobe as an outstanding place to work. Adobe relocated their corporate headquarters from Mountain View to San Jose CA to support the economic growth of downtown San Jose.

Adobe constructed two 269,000 square foot interconnecting buildings in two phases, with the goal of consolidating people into a well-designed, cohesive high-rise campus that expressed the company's position as an industry leader.

Architect of Record:

HOK

Location:

San Jose, California
